title: (x) Johnny Cupcakes' new logo - custom lettering {Stephen}
content:
Hi, I was wondering if anyone can help me identify the font that is used for the new Johnny Cupcakes logo.  
Thank you in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140722070938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/resized_IMG_5653_6187.jpg)
author: elephantlab

comments.content: Custom lettering. Have a look at [Eclat](http://web.archive.org/web/20140722070938/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/eclat_regular/).

this was done by Clark Orr, one of JC's in-house designer

[http://www.merchology.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140722070938/http:/www.merchology.com/ "http://www.merchology.com/")
